verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> And the <S%H1397>man<s%> who was <S%H6965>raised<s%> on <S%H5920>high<s%> <S%H5002>declares,<s%> The <S%H4899>anointed<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> And the <S%H9335>sweet<s%> <S%H2158>psalmist<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>
"The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by me, And His <S%H4405>word<s%> was on my <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>

"The <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, 'He who <S%H4910>rules<s%> over <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H6662>righteously,<s%> Who <S%H4910>rules<s%> in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%>

Is as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%> [when] the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rises,<s%> A <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> [When] the <S%H1877>tender<s%> <S%H1877>grass<s%> [springs] out of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H4480>Through<s%> <S%H5051>sunshine<s%> <S%H4480>after<s%> <S%H4306>rain.<s%>'

<S%H3588>"Truly<s%> is not my <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>? For He has <S%H7760>made<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with me, <S%H6186>Ordered<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3605>things,<s%> and <S%H8104>secured;<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3468>salvation<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [my] <S%H2656>desire,<s%> Will He not <S%H3588>indeed<s%> make [it] <S%H6779>grow<s%>?

"But the <S%H1100>worthless,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> of them will be <S%H5074>thrust<s%> <S%H5074>away<s%> like <S%H6975>thorns,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> in <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

But the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5060>touches<s%> them Must be <S%H4390>armed<s%> with <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H6086>shaft<s%> of a <S%H2595>spear,<s%> And they will be <S%H8313>completely<s%> <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> in [their] <S%H7675>place.<s%>"

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> had: Josheb-basshebeth a <S%H8461>Tahchemonite,<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7991>captains,<s%> he was [called] <S%H5722>Adino<s%> the <S%H6112>Eznite,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> [by him] at <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6471>time;<s%>

and <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> one of the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> when they <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> who were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H5927>withdrawn.<s%>

He <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3588><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H3021>weary<s%> and <S%H1692>clung<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>brought<s%> <S%H6213>about<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> that <S%H3117>day;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H389>only<s%> to <S%H6584>strip<s%> [the slain].

Now <S%H310>after<s%> him was <S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H89>Agee<s%> a <S%H2043>Hararite.<s%> And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> into a <S%H9131>troop,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> was a <S%H2513>plot<s%> of <S%H7704>ground<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

But he <S%H3320>took<s%> his <S%H3320>stand<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2513>plot,<s%> <S%H5337>defended<s%> it and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines;<s%> and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>brought<s%> <S%H6213>about<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>victory.<s%>

Then <S%H7969>three<s%> of the <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H7218>men<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H7105>time<s%> to the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%> while the <S%H9131>troop<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was <S%H2583>camping<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H4686>stronghold,<s%> while the <S%H4673>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H183>had<s%> a <S%H183>craving<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>"Oh<s%> that <S%H4310>someone<s%> would <S%H8248>give<s%> me <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> from the <S%H877>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is by the <S%H8179>gate!<s%>"

So the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H1234>broke<s%> <S%H1234>through<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H7579>drew<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H877>well<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was by the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> [it] and <S%H935>brought<s%> [it] to <S%H1732>David.<s%> Nevertheless he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H8354>drink<s%> it, but <S%H5258>poured<s%> it out to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be it <S%H2486>far<s%> from me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this.<s%> [Shall I <S%H8354>drink<s%>] the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H1980>went<s%> in [jeopardy] of their <S%H5315>lives<s%>?" Therefore he <S%H14>would<s%> not drink it. <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> <S%H6213>did.<s%>

And <S%H52>Abishai,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> was <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H7992>thirty.<s%> And he <S%H5782>swung<s%> his <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2491>killed<s%> [them,] and had a <S%H8034>name<s%> as well as the <S%H7969>three.<s%>

He was <S%H4480>most<s%> <S%H3513>honored<s%> of the <S%H7969>thirty,<s%> therefore he <S%H1961>became<s%> their <S%H8269>commander;<s%> however, he did not <S%H935>attain<s%> to the <S%H7969>three.<s%>

Then <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6909>Kabzeel,<s%> who had done <S%H7227>mighty<s%> <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> <S%H5221>killed<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> [sons of] <S%H739>Ariel<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> He also <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> a <S%H9030>lion<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of a <S%H877>pit<s%> on a <S%H7950>snowy<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And he <S%H5221>killed<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> an <S%H4758>impressive<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> Now the <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> [had] a <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to him with a <S%H7626>club<s%> and <S%H1497>snatched<s%> the <S%H2595>spear<s%> from the Egyptian's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H2026>killed<s%> him with his own <S%H2595>spear.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> [things] <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3077>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> and had a <S%H8034>name<s%> as well as the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men.<s%>

He was <S%H3513>honored<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H7970>thirty,<s%> but he did not <S%H935>attain<s%> to the <S%H7969>three.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> him <S%H413>over<s%> his <S%H4928>guard.<s%>
<S%H6214>Asahel<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was among the <S%H7970>thirty;<s%> <S%H445>Elhanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%>
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%> <S%H470>Elika<s%> the <S%H2733>Harodite,<s%>
<S%H2503>Helez<s%> the <S%H6407>Paltite,<s%> <S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6142>Ikkesh<s%> the <S%H8621>Tekoite,<s%>
<S%H44>Abiezer<s%> the <S%H6069>Anathothite,<s%> <S%H4012>Mebunnai<s%> the <S%H2843>Hushathite,<s%>
<S%H9485>Zalmon<s%> the <S%H266>Ahohite,<s%> <S%H4121>Maharai<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%>

<S%H2460>Heleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1196>Baanah<s%> the <S%H5200>Netophathite,<s%> <S%H863>Ittai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7380>Ribai<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%>
<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> a <S%H6553>Pirathonite,<s%> <S%H1914>Hiddai<s%> of the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1608>Gaash,<s%>
Abi-albon the <S%H6164>Arbathite,<s%> <S%H5820>Azmaveth<s%> the <S%H978>Barhumite,<s%>
<S%H455>Eliahba<s%> the <S%H8170>Shaalbonite,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3464>Jashen,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan,<s%>
<S%H8048>Shammah<s%> the <S%H2043>Hararite,<s%> <S%H279>Ahiam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8325>Sharar<s%> the <S%H2043>Ararite,<s%>

<S%H467>Eliphelet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H308>Ahasbai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H4602>Maacathite,<s%> <S%H463>Eliam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> the <S%H1526>Gilonite,<s%>
<S%H2695>Hezro<s%> the Carmelite, <S%H6474>Paarai<s%> the <S%H701>Arbite,<s%>
<S%H3008>Igal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> of <S%H6678>Zobah,<s%> <S%H1137>Bani<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadite,<s%>

<S%H6768>Zelek<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite,<s%> <S%H5171>Naharai<s%> the <S%H886>Beerothite,<s%> <S%H3627>armor<s%> <S%H5375>bearers<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%>
<S%H5896>Ira<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%> <S%H1619>Gareb<s%> the <S%H3505>Ithrite,<s%>
<S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite;<s%> thirty-seven in <S%H3605>all.<s%>
